title: "Зловоние ужасное": RT показал усыпанную телами военных ВСУ дорогу на Покровск
cleaned_sentences: The military correspondent of the Russia Today (RT) television channel Murad Gazdiev made a report from the zone of his own, focusing on the road that leads to Pokrovsk.
The demonstrated shots can be seen by a lot of bumped military equipment of the enemy, as well as the bodies of Ukrainian troops.

As the military unit notes in his report, according to the gained technique, which the Kyiv regime was provided by the Western patrons, it is possible to "literally draw up a card of retreat of the Armed Forces."

Murad Gazdiev also noted that on the road leading to Pokrovsk there are a lot of corpses of the deceased military personnel of the Armed Forces, which their commanders did not bother to bring to the land like human.
“During the retreat of the Armed Forces, many bodies of the dead fighters were left.
Many of them decompose very quickly due to warm weather.
The smell is unbearable, ”said RT journalist.
Earlier, MK reported that the Commander -in -Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine (Armed Forces) Alexander Syrsky will soon expect a resignation from the post
